text: The mechanism for the induction of autophagy was not determined , although it was shown not to be by induction of ER stress , MTOR inhibition or via sirtuin 1 . In addition , it was not confirmed whether nsp6 was responsible for the induction of autophagy in virus infected cells . However , in agreement with previous work , virus infection was not inhibited by the knockdown of ATG5 expression [ 55 ] .
